an6.59:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
an6.59:1.3: Atha kho dārukammiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho dārukammikaṃ gahapatiṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an6.59:1.4: “api nu te, gahapati, kule dānaṃ dīyatī”ti?
an6.59:1.6: Tañca kho ye te bhikkhū āraññikā piṇḍapātikā paṃsukūlikā arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, tathārūpesu me, bhante, bhikkhūsu dānaṃ dīyatī”ti.
an6.59:2.1: “Dujjānaṃ kho etaṃ, gahapati, tayā gihinā kāmabhoginā puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvasantena, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhontena, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhārayantena, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyantena ime vā arahanto ime vā arahattamaggaṃ samāpannāti.
an6.59:3.1: Āraññiko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato unnaḷo capalo mukharo vikiṇṇavāco muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
an6.59:3.3: Āraññiko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato anunnaḷo acapalo amukharo avikiṇṇavāco upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo.
an6.59:4.1: Gāmantavihārī cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:4.3: Gāmantavihārī cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:5.1: Piṇḍapātiko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:5.3: Piṇḍapātiko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:6.1: Nemantaniko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:6.3: Nemantaniko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:7.1: Paṃsukūliko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:7.3: Paṃsukūliko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:8.1: Gahapaticīvaradharo cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato unnaḷo capalo mukharo vikiṇṇavāco muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
an6.59:8.3: Gahapaticīvaradharo cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato anunnaḷo acapalo amukharo avikiṇṇavāco upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo.
an6.59:9.1: Iṅgha tvaṃ, gahapati, saṃghe dānaṃ dehi.
an6.59:9.2: Saṃghe te dānaṃ dadato cittaṃ pasīdissati.
an6.59:9.3: So tvaṃ pasannacitto kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissasī”ti.
